select id,username,screen_name from user as t
and (t.id = #{queryParam.criteria} or t.username like concat("%",#{queryParam.criteria},"%") or t.screen_name like concat("%",#{queryParam.criteria},"%")) and t.id in (select distinct user_id from auth_rel_role_user where status=1 and role_id=#{queryParam.roleId})
ORDER BY t.id desc
